string-array.name: UnableToReadConfig
string-array.item:
"qti-logkit has encountered a corrupt config file.
Please update the file:
%1$s"

string-array.name: UnableToReadCommand
string-array.item:
"qti-logkit has encountered a corrupt command file.
Please update the firmware or client:
%1$s"

string-array.name: UnableToStartSession
string-array.item: Unable to start session because selected storage is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access

"Unable to start session because selected storage is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access
"

string-array.name: LowSpace
string-array.item: Warning: Selected storage location only has %1$s available

string-array.name: SessionStoppedNoSpace
string-array.item: Logging session was forced to stop because selected storage location is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access

"Logging session was forced to stop because selected storage location is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access
"

string-array.name: ContinuousLogsStoppedNoSpace
string-array.item: Continuous logs were stopped because selected storage location is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access

"Continuous logs were stopped because selected storage location is full, missing or qti-logkit does not have permission to access
"

string-array.name: CommandFailure
string-array.item:
"qti-logkit failed to execute command %1$s
Logging will continue, but will not include logs for this command.
"

string-array.name: ReadFailure
string-array.item:
"qti-logkit failed to read file for %1$s
Logging will continue, but will not include logs for this file.
"

string-array.name: DateTooOld
string-array.item: Device date is set incorrectly, please update

"Device date is set incorrectly (before 1/1/2016)
Please update the device date
"

string-array.name: UpdatedConfig
string-array.item: Config updated, click to reload the configurations

string-array.name: DroppedDiagPackets
string-array.item: Diag packets are being dropped due to high throughput

string-array.name: DiagTimeout
string-array.item: "Diag response was not received in the expected time limit. Diag log may not have sufficient information to debug"
